system.description:
They are inhabitants of distant steppes where they fight Turk and Tartar, but some occasionally make their way to Helvéczia, where they astound everyone with their capacity for drinking and merriment – although they revere their icons with equal fervour.

  • If they down a bottle of spirits, they receive +2 to Bravery saves until the end of the scene. This bonus increases to +3 if the drink is champagne wine or vodka, but subsequent rounds of the stuff give a -2 to attack rolls and Dexterity-based checks.
  • They always roll twice for downtime complications, taking the more outrageous result at the gamemaster’s choice (c.f. “The Price of Idleness, Chapter XVI).
